Body:
responses.add(responses.GET, rest_url('bug', 1017315), body=
    "It's all broken", status=500, content_type='application/json',
    match_querystring=True)
bugzilla = Bugsy()
with pytest.raises(BugsyException) as e:
    bugzilla.get(1017315)
assert str(e.value
    ) == "Message: We received a 500 error with the following: It's all broken Code: None"
responses.activate
